code_value: Questions 1-2: You see your friend Lucy is using an electronic dictionary for her vocabulary learning. Ask her two questions about the dictionary.</br> Questions 3-4: There is something wrong with your laptop and you go to the store to have it repaired. You ask the repairman two questions about it.
Questions 1-2: You see your friend Lucy is using an electronic dictionary for her vocabulary learning. Ask her two questions about the dictionary.
Questions 3-4: There is something wrong with your laptop and you go to the store to have it repaired. You ask the repairman two questions about it.
